Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither.quant.QuantizationFunction

  • Packages that use QuantizationFunction 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither  
    com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither.quant  

    • Uses of QuantizationFunction in com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither with parameters of type QuantizationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BufferedImage AbstractDitherer.dither(BufferedImage source, QuantizationFunction quantizer)
      Applies a QuantizationFunction to each pixel in the source image and dithers (diffuses) the quantization error.
      BufferedImage Ditherer.dither(BufferedImage source, QuantizationFunction quantizer)
      Applies a QuantizationFunction to each pixel in the source image and dithers (diffuses) the quantization error.

    • Uses of QuantizationFunction in com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither.quant

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.transform.dither.quant that implement QuantizationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ColorReductionQuantizer
      Quantizes (reduces) a 24-bit, RGB-encoded color value to a reduced palette where the total number of unique color values cannot not exceed a specified count.
      class  GrayscaleQuantizer
      Quantizes (reduces) a 24-bit, RGB-encoded color value to a gray-scale palette where the total number of unique grays cannot not exceed a specified count.
      class  MonochromaticQuantizer
      Quantizes (reduces) a 24-bit, RGB-encoded color value to a monochrome (black and white) palette where each pixel is either white (0xffffff) or black (0x000000).
